resources.string: There are ups and downs, but whatever happens, you have to trust and believe in yourself.-LM
You must never give up and have faith in yourself.-LM
You cannot predict things in football because anything can happen.-LM
Being the captain is a great privilege and a responsibility to lead a great group with different cultures.-SR
I need to keep quiet and do my talking on the pitch.-SR
Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.-WS
We know what we are, but know not what we may be.-WS
A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool.-WS
